movie.title: Papillon
movie.plot: Wrongfully convicted for murder, Henri Charriere forms an unlikely relationship with fellow inmate and quirky convicted counterfeiter Louis Dega, in an attempt to escape from the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island.

events.title: Papillon successfully escapes from the penal colony
Papillon is sent to a penal colony
Henri Charrière, known as Papillon, is convicted of murder
Papillon first tries to escape from the penal colony
